item.name: Debris on the track: turn to white line
hint.auto.doNotUseNorth: Let Robo find the correct orientation by himself. Do not use 'north'!
hint.auto.noFrontIsWhiteUsedToPositionAu: Almost right. Now try to let Robo automatically find the white line. Use 'frontIsWhite'.
hint.auto.noRepeatUsedToPositionAutomati: Almost right. Now try to let Robo automatically find the white line. Use 'repeat or repeatWhile'.
